attributes.action: Recognise and reward key and essential workers
attributes.additional_details:
With some staff working harder or not even making it home to keep family safe and reduce spread. I want the government to financially reward with a grant to match the remuneration of those furloughed or similar. 
Or allow employers to claim a grant to give these workers an extra 2 weeks off work in the next 12 months to give them time with families or do home improvements to match the rest of country
attributes.background: During this pandemic many workers have been furloughed and have spent quality time with their household families   Managed to do much needed home improvements etc. Key and essential workers such nhs staff and hgv delivery persons. Have been working harder than ever with reduced rests

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
